name: The Dog and His Master’s Dinner
name_original: The Dog and His Master’s Dinner
description:
Based on the fable "The Dog and His Master’s Dinner", this short story game places the player in control of a dog in search of food for their master. 

Features
  • A playable dog with various abilities (jump, bark, and a powerful bark that stuns enemies
  • Two levels with varying difficulties
  • Platforming over obstacles
  • Simple NPC and enemy AI

Partial Controller Support

This game is compatible with the following controllers: 

  • Xbox One  
  • Xbox 360

Credits

Made for MICA 2D Game Design course by Liam Wiley, Naomi Graf, and Samuel Hudgins
